references.paper_title: Reinforcement learning and control as probabilistic inference: Tutorial and review
references.reason: This widely cited tutorial and review paper significantly shaped the understanding of reinforcement learning and control as probabilistic inference problems.
This paper provides key variational inference techniques and analysis for Marginal MAP, which is related to the proposed planning inference method.

references.paper_title: An introduction to variational methods for graphical models
references.reason: This paper offers a fundamental introduction to variational methods for graphical models, forming the basis for the variational approach in the current work.

references.paper_title: Constructing free-energy approximations and generalized belief propagation algorithms
references.reason: This paper introduces the Bethe approximation and generalized belief propagation, which is the foundation for loopy belief propagation and its adaptation in the proposed VBP algorithm.
